entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 04:50 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: E 37 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
